properties.entry: select spc.* from sc_platform sp , sc_amazon_account saa, sc_platform_config spc where sp.id = saa.platform_id and spc.platform_id = sp.id and saa.id = '{@#accountId#}'
select spc.* from sc_platform sp , sc_platform_config spc where spc.platform_id = sp.id and sp.id = '{@#platformId#}'
